name: Document Title: ITP-109-CIV-BRUNT-Street Lighting (Supply and Install)
ITP Description: Street Lighting (Supply and Install)
ITP approved for use by: Jon De Castro
2.1 - Material Compliance - Obtain and review manufacturer documentations for the supply of materials.
Acceptance Criteria - Materials comply with IFC Drawings,VESI Standards.

All materials shall comply with the standards and specifications shown on the drawings. All structural steel, associated components and welding consumables shall be manufactured by companies that hold quality systems certification to AS/NZS ISO 9001.
Enter: Teambinder Hold Point Release Number
2.2 - Inspection of supplied items upon delivery.
Reference - IFC Drawings VR Std Dwg TC1064, TC1065
Acceptance Criteria - Supplied items are to correct spec, class, size, undamaged and brand new.
Luminaires: At the time of delivery, the supplier shall provide hard copies of the following:
○ Storage, handling, loading and off–loading instructions
Verifying Documents - This ITP Signed Off
3.1 - ACCC Form (Australian Competition and Consumer Commission)
Reference - AusNet Services MRPA Quality Management Plan
Acceptance Criteria - Before any works commence, the accredited contractor shall obtain an "ACCC Form" from AusNet Services representative for permission to commence works.
Enter: Teambinder Hold Point Release Number
Frequency - Once prior to works commencing
Reference - AusNet Services MRPA Quality Management Plan

5.10 - Testing and Certificate of Electrical Safety
Reference - AusNet Services Technical Specification IFC Drawings

Attach Documentation: Certificate of Electrical Safety for electrical installation
